subject: Records and Achievements
Soccer
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: With four goals  in a game against South Korea at Red Bull Arena, Abby Wambach broke the international scoring record of 158 by Mia Hamm.
snippet: With four goals  in a game against South Korea at Red Bull Arena, Abby Wambach broke the international scoring record of 158 by Mia Hamm.
